thread.title: Jeff Sessions Was Interviewed in Russia Inquiry

author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Jeff Sessions Was Interviewed in Russia Inquiry
text:
Attorney General Jeff Sessions was interviewed for several hours last week by the special counselâ€™s office investigating Russian meddling in the 2016 election, a Justice Department spokesman said Tuesday.

Mr. Sessions recused himself from the investigation last year, following the disclosure that he had conversations with a Russian official while advising the Trump campaign in 2016. That left his deputy, Rod Rosenstein, in charge of the Russia matter. The attorney general had been expected to be interviewed by investigators...
